attributes.action: Have Military Action In Iraq And Syria Both Air Strikes And Troops On The Ground
attributes.additional_details: In both the previous ground wars British soldiers died but they died for our country. These soldiers are not any ordinary person. These soldiers are heroes  They died to make the world a better and safer place. Ask your self do you want a safe world or an unsafe world?
attributes.background: I want this to happen as in the Afghanistan and Iraq war it made areas of the country safe again. This would also help out with the refugee crisis as residents could move back to their homes when they are safe from Islamic State.
